author: James Joyce
text: Dear Miss Weaver: Many thanks for your letter of 8 instant with enclosures. It is very kind of you to send me the notices and I hope you will send more. The 13 copies arrived. Kindly send me another dozen. I hope you got my M.O. (£2.6.6.). On arrival of your card confirming receipt I shall remit another. I am now out of danger but am still under doctor’s care and my sight is still in some danger. With kind regards sincerely yours James Joyce
